T02D2545a:16a-1: a'a rya manydzu shr'i n'a ma singg'a ti mandala bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2545a:16a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2545a:16a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2545a:16a-5: sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa'i sems can la //
T02D2545a:16a-6: thugs rjes zla ltar bsil mdzad 'jam dbyangs mgon //
T02D2545a:16a-7: rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas la //
T02D2545a:16a-8: de la btud de mi bskyod dkyil 'khor bshad /
T02D2545a:16a-9: de la 'dir zhe sdang gi gnyen por mi bskyod
T02D2545a:16a-10: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas
T02D2545a:16a-11: / dbang bskur thob cing sdom pa dang ldan pas /
T02D2545a:16a-12: yo byad phun sum tshogs par byas la /
T02D2545a:16a-13: dus bzang po la dgon pa 'am nags 'dabs su bde bar gshegs pa bsnyen par bya ste /
T02D2545a:16a-14: sa phyogs der mandala sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa bshags la /
T02D2545a:16a-15: sgo dag pa sngon du 'gro bas gshin rje gshed
T02D2545a:16b-0: @16b por bskyed la bgegs thams cad tshar bcad la
T02D2545a:16b-1: / srung ba'i 'khor lo'i nang du sangs rgyas mi
T02D2545a:16b-2: bskyod pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa spyan
T02D2545a:16b-3: drang zhing mnyes par byas la /
T02D2545a:16b-4: de'i mdun du sdig pa'i dri ma bkru ba la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed do //
T02D2545a:16b-5: de nas sdom pa ma lus pa bzung la stod
T02D2545a:16b-6: zhing bdag med pa la mos shing khang pa yang
T02D2545a:16b-7: gzhal zhing brjod du med pa las ye shes kyi
T02D2545a:16b-8: phreng ba 'khrug pa las grub pa'i nang du gzhi
T02D2545a:16b-9: ham las dang po'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la
T02D2545a:16b-10: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' snying gar rdzogs pa'i
T02D2545a:16b-11: tshul gyis sbyor ba dang po dang rigs mthun pa'i
T02D2545a:16b-13: aa las byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'khor du bltas te /
T02D2545a:16b-14: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa rnams dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba dang /
T02D2545a:16b-15: de dang mthun pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs gyis
T02D2545a:16b-16: de'i dkyil 'khor dang mthun pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba
T02D2545a:16b-17: dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang
T02D2545a:16b-18: ste / rang gi las la sbyar bas las rgyal mchog bsgom pa ni bsnyen pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2545a:16b-19: de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor bris
T02D2545a:16b-20: te lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das
T02D2545a:16b-21: mi bskyod pa / de la rigs dang mthun pa'i
T02D2545a:16b-22: sems dpa' bzhi ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2545a:16b-24: de'i phyi rol du sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02D2545a:16b-25: khyams su yang byams pa dang /
T02D2545a:16b-28: mya ngan dang mun ngas par 'joms pa'i blo gros la sogs pa rnams bri'o //
T02D2545a:16b-29: sgo bzhir ni sgo srung gi tshul dang mthun par gzhag go //
T02D2545a:16b-30: de ltar legs par bris la mchod pa'i bye brag
T02D2545a:16b-31: gis yang dag par mchod nas skal pa dang ldan
T02D2545a:16b-32: pa'i slob ma gzhug cing dbang yang sbyin par bya'o
T02D2545a:16b-33: // de'i slar yang des par mchod nas rigs de
T02D2545a:16b-34: nyid kyi mtshan nas brjod pas yang dag par bstod
T02D2545a:16b-35: // la / dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas
T02D2545a:16b-36: lha rnams la bzod par gsol te dkyil 'khor bsdu
T02D2545a:16b-37: // la / bar bya'o // mi bskyod rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir //
T02D2545a:16b-38: zhe sdang gnyen por gyur nas kyang //
T02D2545a:16b-40: mngon dga'i zhing du skye bar shog / mi bskyod
T02D2545a:16b-41: pa dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /
